name: @pixodesk/svg-animator-web
description: Pixodesk SVG animator for web browsers

scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:e2e:ui: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:update: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test --update-snapshots
scripts.wip-test:e2e: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test --grep @wip
scripts.wip-test:e2e:headed: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test --grep @wip --headed
scripts.wip-test:e2e:ui: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test --grep @wip --ui
scripts.wip-test:e2e:update: npm run build && cp dist/index.umd.js e2e/fixtures/ && tsc -p e2e/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test --grep @wip --update-snapshots
